summary: This bill, H.R. 4982, proposes to designate the United States Postal Service facility located at 1444 Main Street in Ramona, California, as the “Archie Moore Post Office Building.” The bill outlines how any references to the original facility will be updated to reflect the new name. The bill was introduced to the House of Representatives by Mr. Issa and referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
